mapper.update: update task_fire_log set group_name = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, task_name = #{taskName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, server_host = #{serverHost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, server_duid = #{serverDuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fire_info = #{fireInfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id_, group_name, task_name, start_time, end_time, status, server_host, server_duid, fire_info from task_fire_log where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id_, group_name, task_name, start_time, end_time, status, server_host, server_duid, fire_info from task_fire_log
